text: Balilla may refer to: *Balilla, the nickname of Giovan Battista Perasso, a Genoese boy who started the revolt of 1746 against the Habsburg forces that occupied the city *Fiat Balilla, a compact car designed and developed by Fiat in 1932 *Italian submarine Balilla *Balilla Lombardi, an Italian professional football player
title: Balilla (disambiguation)
